plugin.name: Add_Newline_To_Prompt
plugin.author: Nick Gammon
plugin.purpose: Adds a newline to prompt lines
plugin.description:
Detects prompt lines without a newline, and if found, adds one.
Change ENTITY line on 3rd line of plugin to be a regular expression that matches your prompt.

muclient.script:
re = rex.new ("&prompt_regexp;")
function OnPluginPacketReceived (s)
if (re:match (s)) then return s .. "\n" else return s end -- if
end -- function OnPluginPacketReceived
